snippet: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Helena filed for bankruptcy protection on Friday as part of a proposed $15 million settlement for hundreds of victims who say clergy members sexually abused them over decades while the church covered it up.
abstract: Roman Catholic Diocese of Helena, Mont, files for bankruptcy protection as part of proposed $15 million settlement for hundreds of victims who say clergy members sexually abused them over decades while the church covered it up.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Helena filed for bankruptcy protection on Friday as part of a proposed $15 million settlement for hundreds of victims who say clergy members sexually abused them over decades while the church covered it up.
